title: I have turned on Wi-Fi on my phone, but it cannot detect signals from Wi-Fi hotspots. What can I do?
answer:
I have turned on Wi-Fi on my phone, but it cannot detect signals from Wi-Fi hotspots while other phones can detect Wi-Fi signals. What can I do? 

- Verify that the Wi-Fi hotspot's service set identifier (SSID) is not hidden.   
 - Restart the Wi-Fi function on your phone.   
 - Restart your phone
